item.title: Helldivers 2's Next Event Has the Weight of Democracy on Its Shoulders
item.description:
The world of Helldivers 2 is eerily quiet. Since the climax of the Heart of Democracy event, the Galactic War has stalled. The Automatons were pushed back with overwhelming force, the Terminid threat is contained behind heavily fortified control systems, and most planets on the map are either secured or in slow, routine liberation. With no new major directives from Super Earth, players are stuck running basic missions with no real stakes. For a live-service game built around communal war effort, this slow pace feels unnatural.

But this drought might be more calculated than it seems. Arrowhead may be holding back its next major operation until the Xbox launch in August. A grand-scale event would give new Xbox players something huge to jump into right away. The risk, however, is that the longer the war front remains stagnant, the more players lose touch with what made Helldivers 2 so compelling: a live, reactive world where players’ actions shape the galaxy.

Helldivers 2's Xbox Launch Needs a Large-Scale Event

The Helldivers 2 Xbox launch can’t just be about welcome messages or weapon camos; it needs a large-scale event that reels in new players, something with the intensity of the Malevelon Creek defense or the release of the EXO-45 Patriot. Thousands of new players will flood in expecting action, purpose, and chaos. If all they find are daily missions and slow-moving warfronts, it’ll feel like the game’s best moments are already behind them.

A live event with time-limited goals, shifting frontlines, and real failure stakes would give the launch purpose and direction. Maybe a failed experiment causes a new bug strain to emerge across multiple sectors. Maybe Helldivers 2 's Automatons regroup and launch a counter-invasion. What matters is that Xbox players don’t feel like they’re catching the game on cooldown; they need a reason to drop in, suit up, and fight like the war depends on them. Big events also give existing players a reason to log back in, which means faster matchmaking and fuller lobbies for everyone.

Other Games Have Done This, and it Works

Plenty of live-service games have proven that pairing a platform launch or major update with a big event spikes interest and pulls in new players. For instance, when Destiny 2 went free-to-play, Bungie launched it alongside the Shadowkeep expansion. This move helped pull in both longtime players and first-timers eager to experience something fresh. Similarly, when Warframe released on Nintendo Switch, it came with a double XP event and time-limited alerts that rewarded rare items. Fortnite also built its Chapter 2 launch around the black hole event, which pulled in record-breaking player numbers. In each case, the event gave players the perfect moment to jump in and be part of something big.

What Does Arrowhead Need to Do for the Next Helldivers 2 Event?

The next event needs to bring back the hype of peak Helldivers 2 . Events like Malevelon Creek, the liberation of Meridia, Calypso, and the Battle of Super Earth were full-blown operations where the community fought hard for days. Players had limited time to push back overwhelming enemy forces. Every win felt earned. Every loss stung. Reddit threads blew up with player discussions and memes. The map changed hour by hour. It felt like being part of a real war effort, and that kind of shared urgency is exactly what Helldivers 2 needs to recreate when Xbox players arrive.

Arrowhead can lean into the lore. The event could start with Super Earth calling for global reinforcements after a catastrophic loss. The war effort is collapsing on multiple fronts, and the only way to survive is to bring in more troops, and Xbox players are those troops. Even the mission briefings could reflect this, where new ships land in orbit with Xbox-exclusive armor decals. The goal is simple: make Xbox players feel like they’re not joining late, but rather, arriving just in time to turn the tide.

item.title: Death Stranding 2: All Cosmetics and How to Get Them
item.description:
Death Stranding 2 allows for a range of cosmetic changes, providing players with unique unlocks from a multitude of preppers so that Sam can customize his look to not only feel fresh in design, but have unique perks associated with each new outfit and hat that he can collect by uniting Australia to the Chiral Network.

With suits, hats, hoods, masks, and sunglasses to collect, players are going to want to check in here so that they have a definitive spot to help them collect all cosmetics in Death Stranding 2 without delay.

All Outfits in Death Stranding 2

How to Get All Suits in Death Stranding 2

There are 12 suits that players can unlock in Death Stranding 2, and each of them has been listed below with descriptions on how to get them, along with the special effects players will get when wearing them.

Suit

Effects

How to Get

Normal Suit

Customizable with a variety of colors.

Automatically unlocked at the start of the game.

Black Camo Suit

Camouflages you in rocky or muddy environments.

Automatically unlocked at the start of the game.

Desert Yellow Suit

Camouflages you in rocky or sandy environments.

Unlocked after connecting the Government's Base in Main Order 9.

Squares Suit

Camouflages you in snow or asphalt.

Unlocked after connecting the Northern Environmental Observatory in Main Order 16.

Desert Green Suit

Camouflages you in muddy or mossy environments.

Reach Connection Level 2 with the Dowser (connected via Main Order 21).

AI Suit

Prevents the wearer from being detected by mole mines AI cameras.

Unlocked after connecting the Data Scientist in Main Order 25.

Pizza Chef Suit

N/A.

Reach Connection Level 5 with the Pizza Chef (connected via Main Order 24 and must find his Misanga in the nearby MULE base).

Desert Red Suit

Camouflages you in muddy and sandy environments.

Reach Connection Level 4 with the Pioneer (connected after Main Order 28 by the Motherhood).

Woodland Suit

Camouflages you in muddy and mossy environments.

Unlocked after connecting The Ghost Hunter (Sub Order 109 from the Chronobiologist, who is connected via Main Order 31)

Junji Ito Suit

An anti-BT effect; making it easier to escape from gazers and watchers.

Unlocked after connecting the East Distribution Center (F5) in Main Order 34.

Rescue Suit

Animals cannot escape when secured to this suit.

Reach Connection Level 4 with the Adventurer (connected via Main Order 36).

All Hats and Hoods in Death Stranding 2

How to Get Every Hat and Hood in Death Stranding 2

There are a total of 9 hats and 2 hoods in Death Stranding 2 , and each of them requires a unique unlock for players to complete via connections across Australia. Hats and hoods are cosmetics placed on Sam's head that allow for some pretty great effects, and each of them can be found below:

Hat/Hood

Effects

How to Get

'Why Me?' Hat

Slows the rate at which stamina is depleted.

Automatically unlocked at the start of the game.

Drawbridge Hat

Slows the rate at which stamina is depleted.

Automatically unlocked after Main Order 7.

KJP Cap

Slows the rate at which stamina is depleted.

Automatically unlocked after Main Order 7.

Nousagi Hat

Slows the rate at which stamina is depleted and makes Sam say "Peko!"

Reach Connection Level 2 with the Data Scientist after Main Order 25.

Knitted Cap

Makes it harder to lose consciousness.

Reach Connection Level 4 with the Pizza Chef (connected via Main Order 24 and must find his Misanga in the nearby MULE base).

Pizza Chef's Hat

Slows the rate at which stamina is depleted.

Reach Connection Level 5 with the Pizza Chef (connected via Main Order 24 and must find his Misanga in the nearby MULE base).

Chiral Rodent Hat

Has a calming effect on nearby chiral creatures.

Reach Connection Level 2 with the Metagenomicist (connected via Main Order 33).

Chiral Spider Hat

Has a calming effect on nearby chiral creatures. If Sam's stamina drops below a certain level, the hat will also draw blood in order to replenish it.

Reach Connection Level 4 with the Metagenomicist (connected via Main Order 33).

Santa Hat

Slows the rate at which stamina is depleted.

Reach Connection Level 3 with the Phantom Smith (connected via Main Order 40).

Otter Hood

Greatly improves your swimming abilities and stops Sam from drowning.

Unlocked after connecting the Inventor by finding lost cargo around Mine North of F1.

Camel Hood

Reduces stamina drain in the heat and slightly increases cargo capacity. The hood's water supply will restore Sam's stamina if it drops to a certain level, and it replenishes when the hood is exposed to timefall or immersed in water.

Reach Connection Level 2 with the Pioneer (connected after Main Order 28 by the Motherhood).

All Sunglasses and Masks in Death Stranding 2

How to Get All Sunglasses and Masks in Death Stranding 2

There are a total of 10 sunglasses and 3 masks in Death Stranding 2 , and despite these visual differences and unlock requirements of each of them, players will see the same effect for each as all they do is block direct sunlight and reflect it, as well as allowing for Sam to look pretty cool.

Sunglasses/Mask

Effects

How to Get

'Ludens Mask' Sunglasses

Blocks direct and reflected sunlight.

Automatically unlocked at the start of the game.

'Sam' Sunglasses

Blocks direct and reflected sunlight.

Automatically unlocked at the start of the game.

PINO-01

Blocks direct and reflected sunlight.

Unlocked after connecting West Fort Knot in Main Order 14.

Heartman's Glasses (Regular)

Blocks direct and reflected sunlight.

Unlocked after completing Main Order 23.

TTL-02

Blocks direct and reflected sunlight.

Unlocked after completing Main Order 30.

Heartman's Glasses (Shutter)

Blocks direct and reflected sunlight.

Unlocked after completing Main Order 31.

Heartman's Heart-Shaped Glasses

Blocks direct and reflected sunlight.

Unlocked after completing Main Order 37.

Heartman's Star-Shaped Glasses

Blocks direct and reflected sunlight.

Unlocked after entering the Bridge of the DHV Magellan on the in-game set birthday.

Deadman's Glasses

Makes Sam's eyes look bigger than they are.

Unlocked after completing Main Order 37.

Goggles

Blocks direct and reflected sunlight.

Reach Connection Level 3 with the Aeronautical Engineer (connected via Sub Order 122 from Eastern Environmental Observatory after Main Order 38).

Yotei Mask

Blocks direct and reflected sunlight.

Deliver any lost cargo or Sub Order to the Adventurer after Main Order 38.

Red Mask

Cannot be detected by BTs while holding your breath. Blocks direct and reflected sunlight.

Reward for completing the main story.

Golden Mask

Blocks direct and reflected sunlight.

Reward for completing the main story.

Death Stranding 2: On the Beach
9.3 /10
Released
June 26, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Embark on an inspiring mission of human connection beyond the UCA. Sam—with companions by his side—sets out on a new journey to save humanity from extinction. Join them as they traverse a world beset by otherworldly enemies, obstacles and a haunting question: should we have connected? Step by step, legendary game creator Hideo Kojima changes the world once again.

ESRB
Mature 17+ // Violence, Blood and Gore, Partial Nudity, Strong Language
Developer(s)
Kojima Productions
Publisher(s)
Sony Interactive Entertainment
Platform(s)
PlayStation 5

item.title: Insomniac Games Could Be on the Verge of a Ridiculous Marvel Hot Streak
item.description:
A new rumor making the rounds online suggests that the next five years are going to be absolutely massive for Insomniac Games and fans of its Marvel projects. Insomniac Games has found incredible success with its Spider-Man video games, and the studio has already announced that it is working on a Wolverine game for PS5 as well.

The Wolverine PS5 game was announced years ago, but there haven't been many other official updates on the project beyond that it's still in the works. The unfortunate Insomniac Games data leak revealed rough, early footage of Wolverine gameplay, and also revealed the studio's planned roadmap of releases moving forward. Now a new rumor may give further insight into when exactly Insomniac Games fans can expect these games to start hitting the market. If the rumor is true, Insomniac is about to go on a ridiculous hot streak of releases.

The rumor comes from YouTuber TheMaggshow, as spotted by ComicBook, and should be taken with a grain of salt. However, if their information is accurate, it seems as though the long-rumored Venom game from Insomniac will be releasing in 2026, with the Wolverine game dropping at some point in 2027. Finally, it's claimed that Spider-Man 3 is aiming for a 2029 release. If that's true, one has to imagine that Spider-Man 3 will be launching on the PlayStation 6 as opposed to the PS5, but again, fans should take these claims with a grain of salt for now.

Rumored Insomniac Games Roadmap

  • Venom - 2026
  • Wolverine - 2027
  • Spider-Man 3 - 2029

These claims are at odds with Insomniac's leaked roadmap, but it's worth pointing out that the Insomniac roadmap seems to have been pushed back. Originally, it was believed that Venom would launch in 2025 with Wolverine releasing in 2026. Spider-Man 3 was supposedly going to launch in 2028, with a new Ratchet & Clank dropping in 2029 before Insomniac's X-Men game makes its debut in 2030. The latest State of Play event came and went with no mention of Venom or Wolverine , so it would make sense that the timeline has shifted, with everything pushed back by about a year.

While it's disappointing that fans may have to wait longer than expected for these games, if the leaks are accurate, Insomniac is about to go on an incredible hot streak to close out the decade. If the Venom game is real and is truly next in line, hopefully fans get their first glimpse of it sooner rather than later.

item.title: Marvel Mystic Mayhem: How to Get More Dreamgems
item.description:
Marvel Mystic Mayhem is a team-based tactical RPG that takes place in the Marvel universe. Like most mobile games of this genre, Marvel Mystic Mayhem uses various in-game currencies to progress, get new heroes, and upgrade your roster.

The most valuable currency in Marvel Mystic Mayhem is Dreamgems . Their main purpose is to summon new and higher-tier Marvel Super Heroes and Super Villains through the game's gacha system.Thankfully, there are a bunch of ways for free-to-play players to consistently earn Dreamgems and strengthen their team.

How To Get More Dreamgems in Marvel Mystic Mayhem

While Dreamgems are the premium currency, there are several ways to earn them for free, without spending any real money. Listed below are all the ways you can farm Dreamgems in Marvel Mystic Mayhem :

Complete Daily and Main Missions

Completing your daily tasks often rewards a small but consistent number of Dreamgems. Make it part of your daily routine to build up a steady income.

Besides this, Marvel Mystic Mayhem regularly features various in-game events. Many of these events have specific objectives or milestones that reward Dreamgems upon completion. Make sure to always check the Quests and Events tab.

Sometimes, special login events will provide Dreamgems for simply logging in daily for a set period.

Clear Story Stages and Memento Mode

Both the main story and Memento mode reward you with Dreamgems for clearing stages and side missions. You don’t need perfect runs right away, which means you can simply speed through the chapters first. The game still rewards you for full completion later, so you can come back when your team is stronger.

The same strategy applies to Story Missions. Focus on progressing through the content first, then revisit earlier stages to earn perfect stars. You’ll also earn bonus Dreamgems by getting full stars on each chapter, so it’s worth revisiting earlier levels to grab the extra gems you missed.

Marvel Mystic Mayhem allows you to level up your team, and each time you level up, you earn rewards. These rewards can sometimes include Dreamgems.

Share Your Info Scroll

Your Info Scroll features your unique player ID, your current level, achievements, and current heroes. Sharing this info scroll with friends or on social media rewards you with 5 Dreamgems .

5 Images

item.title: Best Free Gacha Games On Steam
item.description:
Summary

  • Tower of Fantasy is a free, open-world MMORPG with diverse anime characters and continuous updates.
  • Girls Frontline 2: Exillum offers a tactical, turn-based RPG experience with unique characters and fan service.
  • Sword of Convallaria is a narrative-rich gacha RPG with interactive environments and classic gameplay elements.

The gacha game space is growing rapidly, with new releases becoming increasingly frequent as the small pool of content expands into a flood of entertainment. Gacha games are a class of games, usually RPGs, that allow players to experience a narrative-rich game while collecting custom-crafted characters by engaging with chance-based systems similar to loot boxes.

Gacha games offer a unique experience that allows players to challenge and interact with the game in their own way, choosing which characters they use and how they play. A wave of these titles have become available on Steam recently, which are worth some attention for fans of the genre. Here are some of the best free-to-play gacha games on Steam, ranked.

7 Tower Of Fantasy

An Expansive Multiplayer Online Experience

Tower of Fantasy
4 /10
6.0 /10
Released
August 11, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
T For Teen Due To Blood, Drug Reference, Suggestive Themes, Violence
Developer(s)
Hotta Studio
Powered by

Tower of Fantasy is one of the newest gacha games on the list, having made its debut just a few years ago. Marching forward with a shared world experience, the game merges the genres of MMO and gacha RPG.

Tower of Fantasy delivers a massive open-world game set in a futuristic techno-punk theme, featuring a diverse array of characters with unique combat capabilities, designs, and narrative significance. The game receives continuous updates and crossovers, with its recent crossover being with Neon Genesis Evangelion .

6 Girls Frontline 2: Exillum

An Enhanced Sequel To A Fan-Favorite Franchise

Girls' Frontline 2: Exilium
Strategy
RPG
Tactical RPG
Systems
Released
December 3, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Powered by

Girls Frontline 2: Exillum is a 3D tactical, turn-based, and grid-based RPG that sends players through scenarios where they must overcome enemy presence or defend specific locations on the map using specialized units. Mixing elements of gacha, RPGs, and third-person shooters, Girls Frontline 2: Exillum is an interesting mix that is sure to entertain.

The game features an extensive roster of unique and beautifully crafted characters that serve both a functional purpose and a fair amount of fan service. Players must assemble and upgrade a powerful squad, utilizing their environment and tactical prowess to complete challenging missions.

5 Sword Of Convallaria

A Gorgeous Narrative-Rich RPG

3 Images
3 Images
Sword of Convallaria
Tactical RPG
Systems
Released
August 1, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
nr
Developer(s)
XD
Powered by

Sword of Convallaria is a turn-based RPG with gacha elements, similar to Fire Emblem Heroes , that also features a color-based combat system. Players embark on a magical story of rebellion, corruption, and a war against the powers that be. This title incorporates classic RPG graphics and gameplay elements, such as turn-based and grid-based combat, and also innovates with interactive environments and features. It's one of the most interesting and unique gacha games on Steam, and is well worth playing.

4 Honkai Impact 3rd

The Pillar Of The Mihoyo Universe

Honkai Impact 3rd
7.8 /10
Released
October 14, 2016

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
t
Developer(s)
HoYoverse (Formerly miHoYo)
Powered by

Honkai Impact 3rd is one of the main lines of games from HoYoverse, the developer responsible for other gacha games such as Genshin Impact and Zenless Zone Zer o. Honkai Impact 3rd is the oldest of the previous games, but has sustained a sizable player base and receives consistent updates and characters.

Like most HoYoverse games, Honkai Impact 3rd is an anime-stylized RPG that has players take on the role of a Captain, who works alongside powerful allies to combat the Honaki, a deadly force that turns humans into monsters. The game features flashy and responsive third-person combat, with a wide variety of characters that fit multiple archetypes, including ranged, melee, and caster roles.

3 Genshin Impact

A Flagship Title Of The Genre

6 Images
6 Images
Genshin Impact
8 /10
202
9.3 /10
Released
September 28, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
T for Teen - Fantasy Violence, Alcohol Reference
Developer(s)
HoYoverse (Formerly miHoYo)
Powered by

One of HoYoverse's crowning releases is Genshin Impact, which became one of the most popular games on PlayStation upon its release. This title offers a massive open-world experience infused with elements of top RPGs, such as The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.

Players step into the role of the Traveler, a being from another dimension who seeks to find their missing sibling. As players progress through the story, they will traverse stunning territories with widely unique architecture and enemy types. Genshin Impact continues to receive frequent updates and has a roster of over one hundred characters that players can obtain.

2 Reverse: 1999

A Supernatural-Focused RPG With Unique Combat

5 Images
5 Images
Reverse: 1999
10.0 /10
Released
October 26, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
12+
Developer(s)
Bluepoch
Powered by

Reverse: 1999 combines gacha elements with an incredibly distinct art style, a unique world setting, and turn-based, card-based combat. When a catastrophic magical event plunges society into chaos, players must find the source of the calamity and save time itself.

An event called the Storm has begun to reverse time, regressing society and threatening all of existence. As the Time Keeper, players collect powerful allies called Arcanums and fight against paranormal monsters to get to the bottom of the mystery and repair the world. Reverse: 1999 features a unique action-point-based combat system that will keep players engaged with the various effects available in the game.

1 Wuthering Waves

An Action-Packed Open-World With Breathtaking Visuals And Story

Wuthering Waves
78
9.0 /10
Released
May 22, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
T For Teen // Suggestive Themes, Violence
Developer(s)
Kuro Games
Powered by

Wuthering Waves is an open-world action RPG developed by Kuro Games, the same developers behind Punishing Gray Raven. The game offers a stunning environment that is continually expanding and features multiple locations for players to explore.

The combat of Wuthering Waves is akin to Devil May Cry, and features a low entry point with a high skill ceiling. The design of both the world and the characters is unlike that of other gacha games, seamlessly blending fantasy, futurism, and modern-day architecture and designs in a satisfying way. Wuthering Waves is quickly becoming one of the best gacha games on the market, and for fans of the genre, a must-play.
